name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Software Engineer with 8 years of experience, I possess a strong skill set in **AWS**, **Linux**, **Apache**, **Nginx**, **PHP**, **MySQL**, and **MariaDB**, with a solid foundation in web development technologies such as **JavaScript** and **Python**. I have successfully built high-performance solutions in the healthcare and financial sectors, leveraging **Flask**, **Gunicorn**, and **CRON** for backend applications.
My expertise also includes modern development practices and frameworks like **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. I have a proven track record of integrating AI/ML capabilities for predictive analytics and intelligent automation within enterprise-grade platforms. 
I excel in developing microservices architectures and event-driven systems, ensuring robust and secure applications that meet compliance standards including HIPAA, FHIR, and PCI DSS. Additionally, I bring valuable experience in implementing CI/CD automation and managing MLOps workflows using tools like **MLflow** and **Kubeflow**, creating efficient environments for deployment and machine learning model serving.
